alert.note: Alert for Potter; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 01 at 2:05PM EST until February 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 3 to 9 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Potter and Tioga Counties. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes as well as the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wintry mix is likely from late Wednesday night through Thursday evening before changing to snow Thursday night.
info.instruction: Review winter weather safety and preparedness information at weather.gov/winter. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
